ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: i can t deny the possibility.  i hope, however, that it is either just let them do it already or no never hehe.  if binding is as complex as some of these
ygData.messageBody:
i can't deny the possibility. i hope, however, that it is either "just let
them do it already" or "no never" hehe. if binding is as complex as some of
these posts hope for, it just doesn't seem worth it. i think that people's
imagination is going wild in order to make it as complex as possible just in
case it will be hard enough for verant to say "OK" and change the policy. i
figure it will be an easy way or no way at all if it is ever changed.

Shada

>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Which is why I said in an earlier post that the possibility
> does exist that
> Verant would change the binding policy somewhere down the
> road to accomodate
> the melee/hybrid casters. If we provide Verant with a
> viable option on how
> to implement the change, they just might consider it.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
